scripts.setup:circuit: snarkjs plonk setup age_verification.r1cs ptau/powersOfTau28_hez_final_16.ptau age_verification.zkey
scripts.generate:vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey age_verification.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.setup:all: npm run compile:circuit && npm run setup:circuit && npm run generate:vkey
